item.title: Top Hash related System Design You should Know
item.description: Hash Map is a data structure that stores key-value pairs. It is backed by an Array. Each index of array is known as Bucket. How to save key-value pair in Map? Key is hashed which returns integer value. Key Value ┌―――――┬―――――――――┐ │ 92 │ Bill │ └―――――┴―――――――――┘ hash(Key) = hash(92) = 92 For simplicity, we assumed that hash returns the same integer as key. Then we find modulo (%) of returned hash by total buckets (size of array or capacity of hash map).
